name: VampLight
description:
In Vamplight, you player play as Nosfer, a bloodthirsty vampire who wakes up from a slumber of many days. Your goal is to go through the town and reach the church to appease your craving for blood ! Feed on the townsfolks in your way but watch out for the light and hide from it or turn into your Shadow Form to avoid it.

Made for the Ludum Dare GameJam, (Still in Development)
